item.title: Yahoo Vespa

item.title: Yellowbrick (Multiple Products)

item.title: Yellowfin (Multiple Products)
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link YellowFinbi Notice Critical Vulnerability in Log4j https://community.yellowfinbi.com/announcement/notice-critical-vulnerability-in-log4j2 Community Resources Resource Link source https://community.yellowfinbi.com/announcement/notice-critical-vulnerability-in-log4j2 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-4104: Not vuln ; CVE-2021-44228: Fix NCSC-NL v7 and v6 releases are not affected unless you have manually upgraded to Log4j2 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-27 15:29:04 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.
